TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_bungluh, title = bungluh, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/bungluh} }

S.FORM: bungluh (kamu nu Hulam: 藤壺；火山爆發), namakay i bayu a kakanan. u bungluh mamin i bayu amin a maudip, i labu kiyadahay i tida i kakelahan maaadihay nu kitidaan. masaadidi' henay malatusa ku ngatu nida, ku nida sananay midanguy a langaw, nika nu dikudan balaki tu caay tu pakalimad tu udip, i tida sananay tu midepit i atekakay a kitidaan, mahida i hekalay a ba'tu miedap tu siduma sa, kan a maudip. nika nanaman masabalaki a bungluh midepit i masasidumaay atekakay nu hekal, pasu u udip nu isu' baba'tuwan, sasa nu balunga, nika pidepit i balunga tada yadah tu ku bungluh, cunusan ku nu nipipulu' tu caliway nu balunga nikapalawpes han tu simal, sisa a pademiad saca misulac, u duma a balunga idaw ku nipasipasipan tu sakacaay pakadepit ku bungluh a zay-liw. i kakelahan hanany u bungluh sa u sakaidaw a kakanan u tademaw i dadipasan kakelahan nu bayu, i baba'tuan malumanay nu balunga atu mapaliday a tuudtuud, madayum a makaadih tu nikaidaw nu bungluh, kaatekak nu hekal mahida u nayay ku ukakay a nu bayuay a aadupan, nikaadih masaadidi'ay a lamalay a buyu'. namakayniay a nasulitan nasakamuan atu natinengan 藤壺

bongloh (kamo no Holam: 藤壺；火山爆發), namakay i bayo a kakanan. o bongloh mamin i bayo amin a maodip, i labo kiyadahay i tida i kakelahan maaadihay no kitidaan. masaadidi' henay malatosa ko ngato nida, ko nida sananay midangoy a langaw, nika no dikodan balaki to caay to pakalimad to odip, i tida sananay to midepit i atekakay a kitidaan, mahida i hekalay a ba'to miedap to sidoma sa, kan a maodip. nika nanaman masabalaki a bongloh midepit i masasidomaay atekakay no hekal, paso o odip no iso' baba'towan, sasa no balonga, nika pidepit i balonga tada yadah to ko bongloh, conosan ko no nipipolo' to caliway no balonga nikapalawpes han to simal, sisa a pademiad saca misolac, o doma a balonga idaw ko nipasipasipan to sakacaay pakadepit ko bongloh a zay-liw. i kakelahan hanany o bongloh sa o sakaidaw a kakanan o tademaw i dadipasan kakelahan no bayo, i baba'toan malomanay no balonga ato mapaliday a toodtood, madayom a makaadih to nikaidaw no bongloh, kaatekak no hekal mahida o nayay ko okakay a no bayoay a aadopan, nikaadih masaadidi'ay a lamalay a boyo'. namakayniay a nasolitan nasakamoan ato natinengan 藤壺
